newsitem.title: ITALY: FORECAST - Italy prelim Nov CPI seen at 2.6 pct y/y.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Italy prelim Nov CPI seen at 2.6 pct y/y.

text.p: Italian consumer prices are seen at 2.6 percent year-on-year in November and 0.2 percent month-on-month after data issued by six sample cities.
Final Italian CPI stood at 3.0 percent year-on-year in October and rose 0.1 percent month-on-month.
Milan, Genoa, Trieste, Bologna, Perugia and Palermo announced their CPI data today. On Friday, Turin, Venice, Florence and Naples publish their figures.
The 10 cities have a combined weighting of 69.7 percent on the total index.
Final official inflation data for November will be issued by national statistics institute Istat on December 5.
